sentence.Network_en: All sorts of colours will result as these flowers hybridise freely.
sentence.Network_cn: 这些花自由杂交后会产生各种各样的颜色。

sentence.Network_en: The clay court was slippery and he was unable to move freely.
sentence.Network_cn: 红土网球场很滑，他不能自如地移动。

sentence.Network_en: Merchandise can now circulate freely among the EU countries.
sentence.Network_cn: 商品现在可以在欧盟各国自由流通。

entry.def: Freely means many times or in large quantities.

example.ex: We have referred freely to his ideas...
example.tran: 我们频繁地提到了他的观点。

entry.def: If you can talk freely, you can talk without needing to be careful about what you say.

example.ex: She wondered whether he had someone to whom he could talk freely.
example.tran: 她不知道他是否有可以倾心交谈的对象。

entry.def: If someone gives or does something freely, they give or do it willingly, without being ordered or forced to do it.

example.ex: Danny shared his knowledge freely with anyone interested...
example.tran: 丹尼十分乐意地和所有感兴趣的人分享他的知识。

example.ex: Williams freely admits he lives for racing.
example.tran: 威廉斯坦承他为赛车而活。

entry.def: If something or someone moves freely, they move easily and smoothly, without any obstacles or resistance.

example.ex: The clay court was slippery and he was unable to move freely...
example.tran: 红土网球场很滑，他不能自如地移动。

example.ex: You must allow the clubhead to swing freely.
example.tran: 必须让杆头一气呵成地挥出。

Sentence.sentence: The author believes that a single-sex school would encourage boys to express their emotions more freely.
encourage boys to express their emotions more freely

sentences.en: It is vital that the contract be freely entered into.
sentences.cn: 自由签订本合同是至关重要的。

sentences.en: It is best to allow the rotor to rotate freely.
Pitch bleeds freely from break in the bark.
sentences.cn: 树脂从树皮的裂口自然地流出来。

sentences.en: She talked quite freely about her work.
sentences.cn: 她坦率地谈自己的工作。
